program description: .                                                   1. Push Ups                                                   Works triceps, biceps, and shoulders.                                                   - Reps: 10 to 20 (modify with knees down if needed).                                                   - Sets: 3.                                                   2. Tricep Dips (on the floor).                                                   Use your body weight and the floor..                                                   - Reps: 10 to 15.                                                   - Sets: 3.                                                   3. Arm Circles.                                                   Extend arms to the sides and make small circles..                                                   - Duration: 30 to 60 seconds.                                                   - Sets: 3

.                                                   1. Wide Push Ups.                                                   Place hands wider than shoulder width to target the chest..                                                   - Reps: 10 to 15 (modify with knees down if needed).                                                   - Sets: 3.                                                   2. Incline Push Ups (on a stable surface like a couch       or bed).                                                   Target upper chest..                                                   - Reps: 10 to 15.                                                   - Sets: 3.                                                   3. Chest Squeezes.                                                   Press palms together in front of your chest and              squeeze tightly..                                                   - Hold: 10 seconds.                                                   - Reps: 10 to 15.                                                   - Sets: 3

.                                                   1. Superman Hold.                                                   Lay on your stomach, lift arms, chest, and legs off         the ground..                                                   - Hold: 20 to 30 seconds.                                                   - Sets: 3.                                                   2. Reverse Snow Angels.                                                   Lay on your stomach, lift arms and legs, and mimic a snow angel motion..                                                   - Reps: 10 to 12.                                                   - Sets: 3.                                                   3. Plank Rows.                                                   In a plank position, lift one hand towards your chest        as if rowing..                                                   - Reps: 10 per side.                                                   - Sets: 3

.                                                   1. Bodyweight Squats.                                                   Stand with feet shoulder width apart, lower until           thighs are parallel to the floor..                                                   - Reps: 10 to 15.                                                   - Sets: 3.                                                   2. Lunges.                                                   Step forward with one leg, lower until both knees are        at 90 degrees, and return. Alternate legs..                                                   - Reps: 10 per leg.                                                   - Sets: 3.                                                   3. Wall Sit.                                                   Lean against a wall with knees bent at 90 degrees, as       if sitting on an invisible chair..                                                   - Hold: 20 to 30 seconds.                                                   - Sets: 3.                                                   4. Calf Raises.                                                   - Stand on your toes, then slowly lower your heels..                                                   - Reps: 15 to 20.                                                   - Sets: 3

.                                                   1. Pike Push Ups.                                                   Assume a pike position and lower your head towards          the ground..                                                   - Reps: 10 to 12.                                                   - Sets: 3.                                                   2. Shoulder Taps (in plank).                                                   Tap each shoulder alternately while holding a plank..                                                   - Reps: 20 taps (10 per side).                                                   - Sets: 3.                                                   3. Wall Push Ups.                                                   Stand at armâ€™s length from a wall and push off..                                                   - Reps: 10 to 15.                                                   - Sets: 3

.                                                   1. Plank.                                                   Hold a forearm or high plank position..                                                   - Duration: 30 to 60 seconds.                                                   - Sets: 3.                                                   2. Bicycle Crunches.                                                   Alternate bringing opposite elbow to knee..                                                   - Reps: 15 to 20 per side.                                                   - Sets: 3.                                                   3. Flutter Kicks.                                                   Lay on your back, keep legs straight, and alternate small kicks..                                                   - Duration: 20 to 30 seconds.                                                   - Sets: 3

.                                                   1. Burpees.                                                   Start standing, drop to a push up, and jump back up                                                   - Reps: 10 to 15.                                                   - Sets: 3.                                                   2. Mountain Climbers.                                                   In a plank position, bring knees alternately to the chest..                                                   - Duration: 20 to 30 seconds.                                                   - Sets: 3.                                                   3. Jumping Jacks.                                                   Standard full body cardio exercise..                                                   - Duration: 30 to 60 seconds.                                                   - Sets: 3
